name: com.mariomatschgi.unity.localizationsystem
description: Mario Elsnig's Localization system. Used to translate text to multiple languages. Easy In-Editor editing drawers/windows for searching, adding, removing and editing locaclized texts. Usage: 1. Import the package 2. Open the search window with the menue-button next to the Play-Button or via inspector next to a LocalizedString variable 3. Add/Remove/Edit your texts
